[Home](./index.md) &gt; [assistive-playwright-client](./assistive-playwright-client.md) &gt; [VMMouse](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.md)

## VMMouse class

Object implementing the [Mouse](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-mouse) interface from playwright, it can send low-level mouse events to the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class VMMouse implements Mouse 
```
<b>Implements:</b> Mouse

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(vm, lastPosition, calibration)](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a [VMMouse](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.md) object. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [calibration](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.calibration.md) |  | [CalibrationResult](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationresult.md) | Reference to the calibration results that are used to convert coordinates. |
|  [lastPosition](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.lastposition.md) |  | [SimplePosition](./vm-providers.simpleposition.md) | Reference to the object holding the last position of the mouse in the screen coordinates. |
|  [vm](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.vm.md) |  | [VM](./vm-providers.vm.md) | Reference to the virtual machine |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [click(x, y, options)](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.click.md) |  | Shortcut for [move](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.move.md)<!-- -->, [down](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.down.md) and [up](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.up.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [dblclick(x, y, options)](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.dblclick.md) |  | Shortcut for [VMMouse.click()](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.click.md) with <code>clickCount</code> option set to <code>2</code>. |
|  [down(options)](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.down.md) |  | Sends a low-level mousedown event to the virtual machine. |
|  [move(x, y, options)](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.move.md) |  | Moves the mouse to the specified position, expressed either as coordinates in the viewport (relative to the top-left corner), or coordinates relative to the center of the DOM element passed as <code>origin</code> in the <code>options</code>. |
|  [up(options)](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.up.md) |  | Sends a low-level mouseup event to the virtual machine. |
